short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launch Omnikit quicktasks right from Etherscan!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button to the Etherscan.io transaction page that enables you to create a Quicktask in Omnikit with all the Ethereum transaction information prefilled into the create a task form, allowing you to quickly create a transaction based on someone elses transaction so you don't miss out on a time sensitive contract interaction!
